entities.name: owl
entities.description: An owl is described as having landed on Harry's shoulder, carrying sweets and cakes.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story, who has an owl landing on his shoulder.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Hedwig is Harry's owl, which may have gone missing.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is a person who may not have received a letter from Hedwig.

entities.name: professor sprout
entities.description: Professor Sprout is the teacher in charge of the class.

relationships.description: The owl landed on Harry's shoulder and was carrying sweets and cakes.
Harry owns Hedwig, which may have gone missing.
Sirius has not received a letter from Hedwig.
Professor Sprout is teaching the class about bubotubers.
